description:
Tired of a dull Home Screen? Dive into Themelia and explore 5,000+ themes, 9,000+ wallpapers, and 12,000+ widgets! From iOS 18 styles, sports, movies, music, anime, aesthetics, Kpop, cartoons, comics, and beyond, there’s theme for everyone.

But that’s just the beginning! Themelia gives you a fully personalized Home Screen experience with features like battery status, date displays, weather forecasts, and more. Make your screen a true reflection of your style!

Themelia Highlights:
- Browse the most stunning content on our homepage.
- 200+ themepacks for matching Home and Lock Screens.
- New free themes, widgets, and wallpapers daily.
- Easy & fast Home Screen updates.
- Mix and match from 5,000+ themes, 9,000+ wallpapers, and 12,000+ widgets for your perfect look.
- Quick setup for themes and app icons.
- All-in-one themes designed for simplicity.
- Plus, raise a virtual pet—your loyal companion will always be with you!

And here’s the game-changer: Themelia’s one-click special theme installer makes customizing app icons, widgets, and wallpapers a breeze. With just a few taps, you can transform your screen to match your style.

Ready to elevate your iPhone’s aesthetic? With our seamless iOS 18 themes, app icons, and widgets, Themelia is your ultimate home screen companion. Explore, choose your favorites, and take your iPhone’s look to the next level!

Privacy Policy & Terms of use:
https://site-widgetopia.colorifystudios.com/Privacy-Policy.html
https://site-widgetopia.colorifystudios.com/Terms-of-Service.html

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to all features within Themify for unlimited access.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:

Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. 

Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered.
Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space.

【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】

Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized.

A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality.

AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in.

【More Than Just Visualization:】

Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life.

Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space.

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life
Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic
Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease
Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space
Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration

Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://homeinterior.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://homeinterior.ai/terms

Do you have a question for us?
info@homeinterior.ai

AR Drawing is an innovative mobile app that allows to create stunning drawings and paintings using augmented reality technology. You can draw anything you want on any surface.

Whether you are an experienced artist or just starting out, this app is perfect for unleashing your creativity and exploring new possibilities in art. So why wait? Download AR Drawing: Sketch & Paint today and start creating your own masterpiece!

AR Drawing, sketch trace draw is your ultimate companion for trace & draw enthusiasts, offering an immersive experience in AR tracing. This app lets you turn any photo or sample into an outline that you can trace, perfecting your skills and creating stunning artworks with ease.

Features:
1. AR Drawing, draw with Camera: Immerse yourself in the world of AR drawing with real-time projections on your drawing surface. Whether it's a real sketch or a fun doodle, our app makes it simple and enjoyable.

2. Turn Photos into Real Sketches: We've added a powerful new feature that allows you to transform any photo into a trace sketch outline. This is perfect for those who want to create detailed, real sketches with precision.

3. Sketch Templates: Explore a wide array of sketch templates from animals to vehicles, Manga to Anime, and more. These templates are perfect for practicing and perfecting your trace drawing technique.

4. Instantly Find and Trace Anything: Import photo from your camrera or gallery or browser. Once you find something inspiring, you can instantly convert it into a traceable sketch and start drawing right away.

6. Capture the Process with Video Recording: Document your creative journey by recording your AR Draw Sketch sessions. This feature allows you to revisit your process or share it with others, providing a unique way to showcase your artistic evolution.

7. Save and Share: Once you've finished your trace to sketch creation, save it to your gallery or share it on social media. Show off your sketch trace to family and friends with just a few taps.

AR Drawing, sketch trace draw is more than just an app; it's your gateway to mastering the art of tracing and sketching. With our newly added features—Turn Photos into Real Sketches and Instantly Find and Trace Anything—your creative possibilities are endless. Whether you're creating a detailed real sketch or a simple outline, our app provides the tools you need to bring your drawings to life with AR tracing.

Download AR Drawing, sketch trace draw today and start your creative journey!

- Experience the best in AR tracing with our cutting-edge technology.
- Transform photos into artistic masterpieces with trace to sketch functionality.
- Create beautiful trace drawings effortlessly using AR draw sketch.
- Perfect your skills with a wide range of sketch templates.
With AR Drawing, sketch trace draw, your creativity knows no bounds. Sketch trace with ease, and explore the world of AR drawing with this powerful app.

Download now and unleash your creativity like never before!

• Privacy policy: https://sites.google.com/view/art-racer-trace-drawing/home
• Term of use(EULA): https://sites.google.com/view/eula-ar-tracer/home

Download AR Tracer: Trace Drawing now and unleash your creativity!

What if your Lock screen, Home screen, and even Control Center could reflect your personality, style, and mood — every single day?

That’s exactly what Wallpapers, Widget & Theme App delivers. Designed for users who want more than just a background image, this app gives you full creative control over how your phone looks and feels. Whether you’re into cute, minimal, bold, or aesthetic styles, this app has everything you need to create a screen setup that feels like you.

WALLPAPERS, WIDGET & THEME APP – MAIN FEATURES

- Aesthetic Wallpapers for Every Style
Choose from a constantly updated collection of high-quality wallpapers. Every style, every mood — whether it’s soft pastels, dark abstracts, or seasonal designs.

- Create Unique Wallpapers with AI
Just type in an idea, a vibe, or a color scheme — our AI turns your words into a unique wallpaper you won’t find anywhere else.

- Custom Widgets for Home & Lock Screen
Build your own widgets for clock, battery, quotes, countdowns, and more. Perfectly match them to your wallpaper with styles that blend beautifully.

- Curated Themes with Matching Design
No more mismatched screens. Apply curated themes that include wallpapers and widgets, designed to work perfectly together.

- Custom Control Center
Redesign your iPhone's Control Center to match your style. Change background color, layout feel, and add new aesthetics.

- Tutorial Setting – Easy Setup for New Users
First time customizing? No worries. Our tutorial setting walks you through every feature — simple, clear, and visual. You’ll get your dream screen setup in minutes.

HOW TO USE

- Open the app and explore Wallpapers, Widgets, or Themes.
- Tap “Preview” to see how elements look together.
- Apply your chosen style to your home or lock screen.
- Use the AI tool to generate custom wallpapers.
- Follow the step-by-step tutorial to learn all features.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
- Subscriptions will renew automatically unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- When the subscription is canceled, it will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
- If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

DISCLAIMER
This app is not affiliated with any of the brands or platforms mentioned. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

Thanks for using Wallpapers, Widget & Theme App.

developer: FITNESS TRAINING GLOBAL ONE MEMBER COMPANY LIMITED
description:
Experience the next generation of drawing with Sketchify – the ultimate tool that transforms how you sketch, trace, and create art. Powered by advanced Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI), this app redefines what's possible in digital and real-world drawing.

Whether you're a beginner, a hobbyist, or a professional artist, Sketchify provides all the tools you need to learn, practice, and create – with unmatched precision and creative freedom.

CORE FEATURES

* AR Drawing – Project, Trace & Create:

- Use your phone or tablet camera to project any image onto real-world surfaces – paper, canvas, wall, or any workspace.
- Trace outlines directly through the screen in real time, making it perfect for learning to draw, replicating artwork, or creating complex designs.
- AR Drawing adapts to your environment and gives you the feeling of drawing with guidance – not just on screen, but in real space.

* Import Image – Draw Anything You Imagine:

- Instantly import photos, sketches, or designs from your photo library.
- Combine with AR Drawing to trace your personal references with perfect positioning.
- Adjust size, rotate, zoom, and align images with your surface for an accurate drawing experience.
- This feature empowers you to draw anything – whether it's a photo you took, a downloaded image, or your own digital creation.

* Drawing Lessons – Learn, Practice, Improve

- Step-by-step drawing guides help you move from basic shapes to advanced techniques.
- Great for beginners who want structured learning or artists looking to refine their skills.
- Lessons are fully integrated with AR drawing for a fully interactive learning experience.

* AI Drawing – Let Ideas Become Art Instantly

- Describe any concept or scene, and our built-in AI generates original artwork within seconds.
- Customize AI-generated images and use them as references for tracing or sketching.
- Ideal for overcoming creative blocks and finding inspiration on demand.

* Search Image – Unlimited Visual Inspiration

- Search directly inside the app to find high-quality image references without switching apps.
- Combine search + AR + import for the fastest and most intuitive drawing workflow possible.

* Recording – Capture Your Entire Creative Process

- Record your drawing sessions from start to finish.
- Perfect for tutorials, sharing your process on social media, or reviewing your progress.
- Export and share with a single tap.

* Coloring Tools – Bring Your Art to Life

- After tracing or sketching, enhance your artwork with easy-to-use coloring tools.
- Play with palettes, gradients, and fill options to make your drawings vibrant and personal.
- Ideal for finished pieces or creative practice sessions.

SMART FEATURES & CUSTOM SETTINGS

- Customizable projection: adjust image placement, zoom, and rotation for optimal drawing alignment.

- User-friendly interface: clean, responsive, and made for creators at any skill level.

- Works seamlessly on both iPhone and iPad.

WHY CREATORS LOVE Sketchify

- AR Drawing is the foundation – unmatched precision and freedom.

- Import anything you want to draw – your photos, AI creations, web images, and more.

- Combines drawing, tracing, coloring, AI, and learning in one powerful app.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:

- Payment is charged to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation.
- Manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in Account Settings.
- Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period, with renewal charged 24 hours prior.
- Canceled subscriptions remain active until the period ends; no refunds are issued.
- Unused portions of free trials are forfeited upon subscription purchase.

Terms of service: https://fitnesstrainingglobal.com/terms_conditions.html

Privacy policy: https://fitnesstrainingglobal.com/privacy_policy.html

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

With Widgy, your home and lock screens become YOUR screens. Create any widget you can imagine to perfectly match your style. Get all the info you need, exactly how you want it, without the clutter.

• Easy Widget Creation •

You don’t need to be a pro designer. Just know what you want, and let your creativity flow. Add an element, pick a data source, throw on some effects, and place it where you want. Repeat until your widget is perfect, then assign it to a slot and drop it on your home screen. Voila!

The Widgy editor is super simple with just two parts: the preview and the layer list. Edit a layer to tweak its appearance and data. The live preview shows exactly how your widget will look, so no more back-and-forth.

• Everything You Need •

Widgy has all the elements and data sources you could ever need, from system info to weather. Display your data as text, charts, or whatever you like.

• No Limits •

Forget templates. With Widgy, everything is 100% customizable. It’s your widget, your way. The only limit is your imagination.

• Easy Sharing & Discovering •

Share your creations with friends or the entire Widgy community in just a few taps. Use a URL, QR code, JSON data, or a file. You can even publish it in the Explore section for everyone to see.

Need inspiration? Check out thousands of widgets in the Explore section, or join the Reddit (r/Widgy) and Discord communities to see what others have created.


NOTE: Widgy optionally integrates with Apple Health. This integration is used to display your data if you select one of those widget types. Permission for Widgy to access this data is controlled through the Apple Health app.

As with Health, all other permissions for Widgy are optional and are there just to show you the data you want to be displayed.
